answers.answer: Hello.  I would suggest you contact JDRF's Online support team.  They have the knowledge about the resources available, and can work with you and your friend to get help.  Here's the link:http://www.jdrf.org/index.cfm?page_id=103451Good luck.

I was looking through the archives on this forum, because I remembered a similar question answered previously.  One volunteer suggested trying to see if your friend qualifies for Medicaid or if there is a state funded program to help pay for diabetic supplies.

question: Does anyone know how to get assistance to pay for diabetes medication.  My friend has a son that has mental illness.  Her insurance has minimal coverage.  She needs assistance for his care as well as support.  She is a hard working single parent and any suggestions will be helpful.  She makes too much money for help, but not enough money to pay for all of the health issues.Thanks
